title: Copy Rights Issue
body: I am planning to prepare some online quizzes for a job application and I need a bunch of LoL champion images. I know that I can not simply use any photo on the Internet. I limited my image search on chrome thinking of copy rights but I ended up with no proper images for my quizzes in the end. I desperately need these images and I don`t know what to do. Could you provide me with some useful info on what to do?

replies.body: I'd say we're pretty lax with content creation, as long as it's not showing the Riot logo.  Make sure to go over everything in our [legal jibber jabber guide](https://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber), and you should be fine!
